data.title: Eric Feldt
data.meta_description: Commander Eric Augustas Feldt OBE, RAN (3 January 1899 – 12 March 1968), was an officer in the Royal Australian Navy and the director of the Coastwatchers organization for much of the Second World War. Feldt, Eric Augustas (1946). The Coastwatchers. Oxford University Press. ASIN B0007DYJIE. ...
data.text:
Commander Eric Augustas Feldt OBE, RAN (3 January 1899 – 12 March 1968), was an officer in the Royal Australian Navy and the director of the Coastwatchers organization for much of the Second World War.

Memoirs[]

Feldt, Eric Augustas (1946). The Coastwatchers. Oxford University Press. ASIN B0007DYJIE.

References[]

Books[]

Clemens, Martin (2004 (reissue)). Alone on Guadalcanal: A Coastwatcher's Story. Bluejacket Books. ISBN 1-59114-124-9.

Feuer, A. B. (1992). Coastwatching in World War II (Stackpole Military History Series). Westport, Connecticut, U.S.A.: Stackpole Books. ISBN 0-8117-3329-7.

Lord, Walter (1977 (Reissue 2006)). Lonely Vigil; Coastwatchers of the Solomons. Naval Institute Press. ISBN 1-59114-466-3.

Macdougal, A. (2002). Australians at War: A Pictorial History. The Five Mile Press. ISBN 1-86503-865-2.

Popular Culture[]

Eric Feldt features in the W.E.B. Griffin series, "The Corps" as commander of the Coastwatcher's organisation.

[]

Gill, J. C. H. (1996). "Feldt, Eric Augustas (1899 - 1968)". Australian Dictionary of Biography, Online Edition. Australian National University. http://www.adb.online.anu.edu.au/biogs/A140157b.htm .
